argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( x = A -> ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> A e. ( R1 ` B ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_pweq | |- ( x = A -> ~P x = ~P A ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = A -> ( ~P x e. ( R1 ` suc B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_bibi12d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P x e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) <-> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( B e. On -> ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P x e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) <-> ( B e. On -> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_rankr1a | |- ( B e. On -> ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ( rank ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eloni | |- ( B e. On -> Ord B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ordsucelsuc | |- ( Ord B -> ( ( rank ` x ) e. B <-> suc ( rank ` x ) e. suc B ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( B e. On -> ( ( rank ` x ) e. B <-> suc ( rank ` x ) e. suc B ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_bitrd | |- ( B e. On -> ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> suc ( rank ` x ) e. suc B ) ) |
| 12 | 6 | #P_rankpw | |- ( rank ` ~P x ) = suc ( rank ` x ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eleq1i | |- ( ( rank ` ~P x ) e. suc B <-> suc ( rank ` x ) e. suc B ) |
| 14 | 11, 13 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( B e. On -> ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ( rank ` ~P x ) e. suc B ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( B e. On -> suc B e. On ) |
| 16 | 6 | #P_pwex | |- ~P x e. _V |
| 17 | 16 | #P_rankr1a | |- ( suc B e. On -> ( ~P x e. ( R1 ` suc B ) <-> ( rank ` ~P x ) e. suc B ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( B e. On -> ( ~P x e. ( R1 ` suc B ) <-> ( rank ` ~P x ) e. suc B ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 18 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( B e. On -> ( x e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P x e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) |
| 20 | 5, 19 | #P_vtoclg | |- ( A e. _V -> ( B e. On -> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_elex | |- ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) -> A e. _V ) |
| 22 |  | #P_elex | |- ( ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) -> ~P A e. _V ) |
| 23 |  | #P_pwexb | |- ( A e. _V <-> ~P A e. _V ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) -> A e. _V ) |
| 25 | 21, 24 | #P_pm5.21ni | |- ( -. A e. _V -> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_a1d | |- ( -. A e. _V -> ( B e. On -> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 20, 26 | #P_pm2.61i | |- ( B e. On -> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ~P A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) |
\
 Alternate shorter proof of ~ r1pw based on the additional axioms ~ ax-reg and ~ ax-inf2 .  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
